name.value: Zombies en La Moneda: Juego de Cartas

item.description:
La Moneda is like the Chilean White House situated in Santiago.

"Zombies en La Moneda: Juego de Cartas" is a card game where players try to rescue as many people as they can in an apocalyptic Santiago, before human batteries that have control over the zombies get exhausted and zombies manage to get control over the city eating everybody’s brains.

This game is based in the successful chilean comic Zombies en La Moneda.

Each player begins with two cards in their hand. Cards can be humans, zombies, infected humans, cops or bombs. On each turn a player has to draw a card and then play a card.

Human cards (with values 1 to 5) are played in front of them and represent the people they have saved.

Zombies are played so that other player has to discard some of their human cards (which ones and how many depend on the zombie played).

Infected humans are very bad cards to have in your hand because they eat two human cards from the same player.

Cops can act as heroes and sacrifice themselves to save humans when attacked by zombies.

Finally bomb cards have 2 uses. They can be used to stop a zombie attack, or they can be used in any turn to gain an additional card to your hand. Either way a bomb would have exploded in "La Moneda".

When the sixth bomb explodes the game will end and the player with more humans saved will win the game!


Editorial Tabula Rasa presenta "Zombies en La Moneda: Juego de Cartas", producto basado en el exitoso cómic chileno homónimo de Mythica Ediciones.

ZeLM:JdC es un juego de cartas no coleccionables ágil, entretenido y rápido de aprender, para disfrutar de 2 a 6 jugadores. En este juego
deberás rescatar a la mayor cantidad de personas en un Santiago apocalíptico, antes de que se detonen las bombas que están dentro del
Palacio de La Moneda. Pero no todo será tan fácil, porque el rescate de cada persona podrá verse interrumpido por los zombies sedientos de
cerebros que vagan por la ciudad.

Objetivo Primario: Elimina la amenaza zombie. Destruye las 6 baterías humanas que dan energía y controlan a los zombies. La misión se dará por terminada una vez que las 6 baterías humanas, que se encuentran dentro del Palacio de La Moneda, sean detonadas.

Objetivo Secundario: Protege a la ciudadanía. Rescata a la mayor cantidad de personas posible y evita que sean víctimas de ataques zombies. Debes tener mucho cuidado porque hay personas que han sido infectadas y en cualquier momento pueden convertirse y atacar a tu propio grupo. Si te encuentras con la policía local, ésta te ayudará con la tarea de defender tu zona de rescate.


 Contenido/Contents: 66 cartas/cards - 1 manual/rulebook
